column1: The Atascocita Volunteer Fire Department provides fire protection services. The Harris County Sheriff's Office provides police services.
The Atascocita CDP is divided between Harris County Precinct 1 and Harris County Precinct 4. As of 2017 Commissioner Rodney Ellis and Jack Cagle head the precincts
column2: respectively.The CDP is served by the Harris County Sheriff's Office District II Patrol

column1: Atascocita students attend school in the Humble Independent School District.Elementary schools within Atascocita CDP include Atascocita Springs
column6: and Whispering Pines. Maplebrook Elementary School is in the limited purpose city limits of Houston and surrounded by Atascocita CDP. Other elementary schools serving portions of Atascocita include Deerwood (Kingwood)
column11: and Summerwood (Houston).Most of Atascocita CDP is served by Atascocita Middle School in the limited purpose city limits of Houston
column14: and Wood Creek Middle School in Atascocita. Some portions are zoned to Sterling Middle School in Humble
column16: and Riverwood Middle School in Kingwood.Most of Atascocita CDP is served by Atascocita High School in Atascocita
column17: while portions are served by Humble High School in Humble
column19: and Summer Creek High School in an unincorporated area outside of Atascocita.Previously Humble High School served the Atascocita area until rapid growth in the community forced the construction of Atascocita High School in 2006.
